evaluation_rubric.description: Every key claim, assessment, or contradiction must be directly traceable to a source URL. The agent must provide evidence, not just make assertions.
The agent must demonstrate that it has performed a thorough scan of the competitor's primary digital assets, not just a shallow scrape of the homepage.
The agent must act as a pure evidence-gatherer. Its output must contain extracted facts, not synthesized opinions or interpretive language.
The data extracted must be specific and detailed, not vague or generic.
